Sentencas: Materials are always among the first considerations to the development of low temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Multifunctional layer-perovskite oxide La2-xCexCuO4 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: In this study, we investigate the multifunctionality of a layer-perovskite oxide La2-xCexCuO4 (LCCO) for its applications in SOFC as cathode, anode and electrolyte.
Titulo: Multifunctional layer-perovskite oxide La2-xCexCuO4 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The performances of the LCCO cathode and anode fuel cells are characterized by I-V-P and electrochemical impedance spectra (EIS).
Titulo: Multifunctional layer-perovskite oxide La2-xCexCuO4 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Results suggest that LCCO is a good cathode material and it can also deliver impressive anode performance.
Titulo: Multifunctional layer-perovskite oxide La2-xCexCuO4 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Though LCCO is noticed to be reduced by H-2 in the anode, the cell performance is relatively stable under multiple times of operation.
Titulo: Multifunctional layer-perovskite oxide La2-xCexCuO4 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The existing of ceria and reduced Cu in it may be a reason for its anode catalytic activation.
Titulo: Multifunctional layer-perovskite oxide La2-xCexCuO4 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: For the application in electrolyte, LCCO is mixed with ionic conductor Ce0.8Sm0.2O2-delta (SDC) in different weight ratios.
Titulo: Multifunctional layer-perovskite oxide La2-xCexCuO4 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Differences in power output and open circuit voltage for the cells containing various ratios of LCCO under normal and reverse operation conditions are highlighted.
Titulo: Multifunctional layer-perovskite oxide La2-xCexCuO4 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The electronic conductivity of LCCO doesn't bring in electronic leakage if it is kept in a certain range.
Titulo: Multifunctional layer-perovskite oxide La2-xCexCuO4 for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The multifunctionality of LCCO would enable it to be potentially applied in single layer fuel cell to simplify the structure and fabrication process of SOFC.
Titulo: Multifunctional layer-perovskite oxide La2-xCexCuO4 for solid oxide fuel cell applications
